plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is fantasy, their favourite kind of plot is complex and multi-layered, their favourite setting is a fictional world, their favourite writing style is descriptive and immersive, their favourite length is novel-length, their favourite topic is magic and dragons, their favourite pacing is slow-burn, their favourite narrative structure is nonlinear, and their favourite themes are loyalty, sacrifice, and the power of the individual.
